changes_summary: These commits primarily focus on the TPT (The Pet Table) and GOC (likely Get Our Care) projects, implementing subscription management features, UI improvements for plan selection and reactivation flows, and performance optimizations. Major work includes filtering deceased pet subscriptions, reorganizing plan selection architecture, adding experimentation hooks, and fixing LCP performance issues on the plans page.

features.name: Deceased Pet Subscription Filtering
features.description: Filters out subscriptions for deceased pets from active subscription lists

features.name: Order Summary Plan Box Integration
features.description: Integrates plan box component into order summary display

features.name: Reactivation Page Plans Info Component
features.description: Displays current plan information on the reactivation page for Good Dog brand

features.name: Addon Categories Carousel
features.description: Implements TPT-style carousel using categories for addon products

features.name: Calories Disclaimer
features.description: Adds calorie information disclaimer to product pages

features.name: Terms & Conditions for Reactivation Entry Point
features.description: Adds terms and conditions display to reactivation flow entry points

features.name: Charge at Checkout Experiment Hook
features.description: Adds experimentation hook for testing charge at checkout functionality

features.name: Bundles Frequency Selectors
features.description: Implements frequency selection UI for product bundles in Factor Form OTP

features.name: Addons Metadata Tracking
features.description: Sends metadata for addon products for analytics or tracking purposes

features.name: Collapsible Order Summary Mobile Experiment
features.description: Implements collapsible order summary for mobile view as an experiment

features.name: Change Plan Price Calculation
features.description: Implements price calculation logic for active users changing their plan

features.name: Edit Delivery Address E2E Tests
features.description: Adds end-to-end testing for delivery address editing functionality

decisions.what: Move voucher code field above in Plans page
decisions.rationale: Improve user experience and visibility of voucher code entry

decisions.what: Use Contentful for managing text content
decisions.rationale: Enable content management without code changes for various UI text elements

decisions.what: Copy CartItem component without changes initially
decisions.rationale: Establish baseline before modifications for reactivation flow

refactors.impact: Plans selection components and related files

refactors.reason: Prepare for customization in reactivation flow without affecting existing cart

fixes.issue: LCP (Largest Contentful Paint) performance increase in plans page
Spacing between plans in PlansInfo component

entities.name: TPT (The Pet Table)
entities.context: Primary brand receiving subscription management, plan selection, and reactivation features

entities.name: Good Dog (GD)
entities.context: Receiving reactivation page components and plan information displays

entities.name: Factor Form
entities.context: Receiving bundles frequency selector functionality for OTP

entities.name: Contentful
entities.context: CMS integration for managing UI text and content keys

entities.name: Plans Page
entities.context: Receiving performance optimizations, voucher field repositioning, and UI improvements

entities.name: Order Summary
entities.context: Integration with plan box component and collapsible mobile experiment

entities.name: Reactivation Flow
entities.context: Multiple enhancements including terms & conditions, plan info display, and address editing

entities.name: Subscription Management
entities.context: Enhanced with deceased pet filtering and cancellation hooks

key_patterns: Feature flagging and experimentation hooks for A/B testing (Charge at Checkout, Collapsible Order Summary)
Contentful CMS integration for content management without code deployments
Component duplication strategy for brand-specific customization without affecting shared components
E2E test coverage expansion for critical user flows
Performance optimization focus on Core Web Vitals (LCP improvements)
Ticket-driven development with clear Jira references (TPT-*, GOC-*, RTEVMS-*)
Incremental refactoring approach (copy-paste then modify pattern)
Metadata tracking implementation for analytics and monitoring
